section.p: Even in the mountains, a thunderstorm is no problem for an accomplished outdoorsman. You swiftly find shelter under an overhang, and professionally set about drying your clothes, shielding a tiny fire from the gale, and ensuring that your sanctuary is well-drained. Come the morning and the passing of the storm you are dry and well-rested.
